member.name: IMFMetadata.DeleteProperty
member.param: Pointer to a null-terminated string containing the name of the property.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFMetadata.GetAllLanguages
member.summary: Gets a list of the languages in which metadata is available.

param.name: ppvLanguages
param.para: A pointer to a PROPVARIANT that receives the list of languages. The list is returned as an array of null-terminated wide-character strings. Each string in the array is an RFC 1766-compliant language tag.
The returned PROPVARIANT type is VT_VECTOR | VT_LPWSTR. The list might be empty, if no language tags are present. The caller must free the PROPVARIANT by calling .

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMetadata.GetAllPropertyNames
member.summary: Gets a list of all the metadata property names on this object.
member.param: Pointer to a PROPVARIANT that receives an array of null-terminated wide-character strings. If no properties are available, the PROPVARIANT type is VT_EMPTY. Otherwise, the PROPVARIANT type is VT_VECTOR | VT_LPWSTR. The caller must free the PROPVARIANT by calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMetadata.GetLanguage
member.param: Receives a pointer to a null-terminated string containing an RFC 1766-compliant language tag. The caller must release the string by calling .

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The metadata provider does not support multiple languages.

member.name: IMFMetadata.GetProperty
member.summary: Gets the value of a metadata property.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name of the property. To get the list of property names, call .

Pointer to a PROPVARIANT that receives the value of the property. The PROPVARIANT type depends on the property. For multivalued properties, the PROPVARIANT is a VT_VECTOR type. The caller must free the PROPVARIANT by calling .

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The requested property was not found.

member.name: IMFMetadata.SetLanguage
member.summary: Sets the language for setting and retrieving metadata.
member.param: Pointer to a null-terminated string containing an RFC 1766-compliant language tag.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMetadata.SetProperty
member.summary: Sets the value of a metadata property.
member.param: Pointer to a null-terminated string containing the name of the property.
Pointer to a PROPVARIANT that contains the value of the property. For multivalued properties, use a PROPVARIANT with a VT_VECTOR type.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Manages metadata for an object. Metadata is information that describes a media file, stream, or other content. Metadata consists of individual properties, where each property contains a descriptive name and a value. A property may be associated with a particular language.
To get this interface from a media source, use the interface.
